data.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
data.author: Elbert Hubbard

data.quote: The worst thing one can do is not to try, to be aware of what one wants and not give in to it, to spend years in silent hurt wondering if something could have materialized - never knowing.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Each mistake teaches you something new about yourself. There is no failure, remember, except in no longer trying. It is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Chris Bradford, The Way of the Sword

data.quote: Don't give up before the miracle happens.
data.author: Fannie Flagg, I Still Dream About You

data.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
data.author: Winston S. Churchill

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow.
data.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

data.quote: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings.
data.author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Hobbit

data.quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
data.author: Martin Luther

data.quote: Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.
data.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

data.quote: I think the thing to do is enjoy the ride while you’re on it.
data.author: Johnny Depp

data.quote: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

data.quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them. Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, but for the heart to conquer it.
data.author: Rabindranath Tagore, Collected Poems and Plays of Rabindranath Tagore

data.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
data.author: Vince Lombardi Jr.

data.quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: A failure is not always a mistake. It may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
data.author: B. F. Skinner
